original_title: Sgt. Pepper live à la Philharmonie de Paris
overview: To celebrate the 50th anniversary of the legendary album Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band, British musician, composer and arranger Ed Harcourt has called on the cream of British rock.  Accompanied by eight musicians, Pete Doherty and Carl Barât (The Libertines), as well as Gaz Coombes and Danny Goffey (Supergrass) take the stage for a revolutionary tribute. Never performed on stage by its creators, the Beatles' musical masterpiece and its gallery of characters come to life during an exceptional concert, recorded on 22 October 2017 at the Philharmonie de Paris.
title: Sgt. Pepper live at the Philharmonie de Paris
